content.label: The game keeps crashing at the same point so all of my progress is useless. I have tried the in game support but it just goes to a page that says that they are no longer using that service.
Demasiado realista
Great game. Love the fact it works offline. Also thank you to the developers that instead of bringing pointless updates instead they give us a new game every year. Keep it up
I spent $12 on in game purchases and then the game froze and now I can‚Äôt play anything. $12 down the drain. I‚Äôd give less than one star if I could.

Obviously, not as in depth as the PC game, but of course I don‚Äôt expect that. Fun gameplay, interesting choices and challenges, this game has it all. This is what mobile games should strive to be. You may hit rough patches during your career, but so long as you understand this isn‚Äôt a game where you‚Äôre meant to plow from the European to the World Series in just 3 seasons, you‚Äôll be fine, keep an eye on your money. IAPs, while helpful, are not at all necessary, and the game is kind of more interesting if you tackle it with no helps or bonuses. Very fun, challenging, not greedy, great replay value to keep you coming back, just a fantastic game, and what all paid games on iOS should strive for. Go Playsport!

title.label: What is the future of MM Mobile 2?

content.label: This is a great game overall. A lot of detail and great playability. However, after paying for MM Mobile 2, I noticed there is now MM Mobile 3. What is the future of 2? Are you going to continue to support it or will it die on the ash heap of previous great games after major new IOS updates such as the upcoming IOS 12?

A very polished, beautiful and fun game. I knew nothing about Formula 1 racing, but MM2 has been a great education. A complicated game with lots to do, but a beautiful and well designed UI makes it much easier. Very interesting and exciting game!
It can be a little too easy at times. Nonetheless, great fun! And sometimes the unexpected does happen, and just when it‚Äôs feeling easy you are screwed... like real racing.

title.label: Would be great with just a few tweaks

content.label: I really do like this game, but there are just a few things that spoil it for me. First, why no practice session before qualifying? They have that in real life, but in the game you have only a few minutes of qualifying to play around with setup. That‚Äôs not really enough. Second, once the season gets started in championship mode, things don‚Äôt vary much from race to race. The same drivers always finish in the top 3. Why not more first lap incidents? Why do the top drivers never seem to make mistakes? What about pit stop mishaps, electrical problems, punctures, or drivers just not feeling well on race day? All of these things happen in real racing, and without some of those random events, things can get really boring. Lastly, the young driver program is mostly useless. I would gladly trade it for a larger roster of potential drivers. Why would I drop millions to develop a driver, then put a 19 year old with no experience on my team? There is almost no chance I would ever hire one of them, so the whole idea is a waste. Just a few improvements like that would make this game really top-notch.

I encountered 1 bug in all my time playing.

Twice.

This bug can occur if you click continue too fast, allowing you to skip a week. 

After this, the results screen that occurs after races may turn blank with the top 3 finishers being a random driver. This occurred for a few seasons until I somehow managed to get it to stop.

In my second encounter with the bug, I skipped a race day. 2-3 races were determined with unknown random drivers placing 3rd and 5th compared to my usual 1,2 finishes. 

I forgot what method I used to fix this bug as this occurred 3-4 months ago.

I hope to see more updates in the coming future! :D
Love the quality it lovely

Firstly let me say the game is awesome. I have put many hours into playing it. However it does crash a lot which causes you to have to redo races a lot. I also wish that I could simulate the race the same way I can simulate qualifying, I enjoy building up the cars and making decisions but the drivers should be able to complete the race without my help. If they make it more stable it would be the perfect game but as of right now I‚Äôm doing the same race for the third time because it keeps crashing right when the race is finished.
Racing strategy simulation heaven! Acceptably deep thought provoking planning and management elements.

I am not going to lie, I love the new update. But I kinda cheat using the game editor add on, with the chairman payment.  We need more cups, as well as a way to add reserve drivers.  I also suggest adding another challenge, called king of the series.  Every race, one team is eliminated.  At the end of 9 races, we will have a showdown.  The top two (only occurs if one person from each team finished in the top two in the final round.) will have a showdown.  It will be a challenge of speed, corners, pit stop times, acceleration, and reliability.  Best car wins the series.
Taken over my time. Great on iPad Air 2. Good stuff ..... never crashes on me. If you like f1 get this game.
First review I have ever given. This game is amazing. Well worth the $. Very in depth. I am addicted.
Recently I started to like F1 again and I just can‚Äôt stop playing this game. It is worth the buy. Thanks for not making it Free-to-play üëèüèªüëèüèª

This game, honestly one of the best simulation games out there is beautiful! The game is very addictive and very fun to play when you are offline. I do believe that We one more series. Or even more. This would be a great addition to the game and its reputation. I believe it will be great if these features were added. This would be great. And like I said It is Astonishingly Beautiful. You should also consider keeping up with real events like the halos from f1 or the hyper soft tires.
Why disnt you add three cars to the team like it wAs brought up in the first one game made would be awesome to have a three car team!
Excellent! Would like to see a bit more depth in car setup, longer qualifying, and practice sessions. individual sector times too.

They do often feel short because of all that happens, even if it‚Äôs meant to simulate a full race worth of action, an option to run long races would make it more immersive with the things that could happen!

This game is well worth the money, even the add-ons. It is very addicting and has endless replay value. I would love to see more in-depth gameplay, but this is a very nice upgrade from the first one. The customization is great, though updated livery options would be awesome! I would definitely pay for more in depth car customization if that were made available. Overall, I love this game and developer, very well done!
This is an amazing and addictive game, and it would be sweet if you could make a NASCAR or stock car version of this game in the future.
The game is fun but the In app purchases start building up to quick to pricey
This is really fun, in fact so fun I want to buy the pc version to experience even greater detail

This game literally keeps me entertained for hours on end. The game is specific enough that it is a good mental/strategy exercise, but simple enough that it isn't too complicated. Overall, the $0.99 pricetag is very cheap considering the hours of entertainment this game provides.

I love this game, I've played the first one and now the second but it feels a bit difficult and I was hoping in the near future if there could be an update that has a much simple career mode while also having the option to play in the original mode, or just add a difficulty option for those who want to play with ease and dominate their league without much struggle thanks.
The worst game on iPhone
Title says it and I recommend this game to people who can manage really well and know Formula 1 racing strategy!

title.label: One of the best mobile games of all time.

content.label: If you ever ask yourself, ‚ÄúIs it worth paying money for this game?‚Äù, when you are about to buy a game, I am here to tell you that this game is WORTH BUYING. The amount of detail on this game is so astonishing, and the fact that it can have all this and be simple enough for you to learn fast, is amazing. The only real problem I would have with this game is that you can‚Äôt save your game in a way that lets you resume a race exactly where you stopped. Other then that, GREAT GAME YOU HAVE HERE PLAYSPORT. 10/10 WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYONE.

title.label: Drops one star because of the weird iCloud sync problem

content.label: The game allows saves to iCloud but they're not automatic. This is a bit weird if you want to save on one device and pick it up on another.  You have to force it to save from the first device, then on the second device, delete a locally saved game and then do a "pull" from iCloud to get it to update. If they could solve that so the three saved game slots automatically sync across devices it would be 5 stars.

This is the best racing based game i have ever played! I used to play the first game a couple years ago and now the sequel is amazing! My onlysuggestionsare to add a fifth color option to some of the color layouts. Also make some more dialogue for the fans and press, what they say for every race other incident gets repetitive. Otherwise the game is perfect!!

title.label: I‚Äôm only being critical because I love it

content.label: Don‚Äôt get me wrong, this is hands down one of the best mobile games of all time. Simple, intuitive controls yet exhilarating and tense gameplay. I love it. My only problem is how much I was spoiled with the PC version. It feels so much more in depth than this version, and while I‚Äôm well aware that mobile phones can‚Äôt handle PC programs (yet), I would love to see some of features trickle down to the mobile game. Things such as more driving modes, being able to rush pitstops, and email would be fantastic to have. I‚Äôm also sure I‚Äôm not alone in saying I would gladly purchase the GT and endurance expansions if they were to come to mobile. Again, I adore this game but I would still love to see some changes

I really love this game and especially the new challenge modes. However, a suggestion for another mode: Free Play

You get to customize the teams/drivers/car ratings and mess around. Kind of like a toy box mode. Like, custom championships or custom single races where you can spectate or even play yourself. It could even be an add on like Chairman's Payment or Editor. Overall excellent game, however that is my suggestion for a new game mode.

This is the single best game I have ever played, and it is so addicting, I play it for about 8 hours straight every time I get on, better than any other games on any other platforms, I just can‚Äôt say enough how much I love this game, great job to everyone at Playsport Games, keep it up!!

title.label: Thought this was called Motorsport manager not formula 1 manager

content.label: I love this game a lot but can you add more series like an IndyCar Series, stock car, or endurance car series. Thank you
This game is amazing, just like the pc version. The only thing I think the game needs is the ability for the mechanics to improve reliability like on pc, but otherwise everything is fantastic
I love this game but I would like to see more series like the old game it feels like you get to the other series to quickly I would also like to see more track I want a oval to

title.label: Game won‚Äôt load past continue career

content.label: After the new update, the game will send me back to the home screen after getting the loading screen.
Sequels usually aren‚Äôt the best. I played the original more than any other game for a few years. And this one steps everything up a notch... ok like 25 notches. This is amazing.

title.label: I‚Äôm a huge fan of the original game.

content.label: And the same for this one, but I would like to see ‚Äúdouble the amount of laps‚Äù option it would be great because I travel a lot, and I to have a 4-5 hour race time so weather can play a huge effect.
Fantastic game. Looking forward to playing the new challenges.

title.label: Great, best F1 manager on mobile.

content.label: I love it! The game is pretty close to it's PC relative. It has room for improvement in some places, like having more stuff to do in between races, but other than that it's a great experience.
I‚Äôm thoroughly loving this game. It has exceeded all of my expectations.

First, I want to say that this game won‚Äôt be for everyone. However, those that are willing to put in the time and have a little patience with it will definitely be rewarded. 

Instead of going right to the Pro/Con thing, here are some points to keep in mind. This is NOT a racing game and you are not directly controlling the cars on your team. Instead you can give them some general direction and the AI does it‚Äôs thing. This is a management game, and your primary role is decision making. (I know that should be obvious by the game title, but you know how people can be...) in the beginning there is little you can do to make sure you win races, but that‚Äôs ok. This is about the long term development of a team, not instant success. 

Cons: The graphics could be a little better, but they are more than sufficient to make each track unique. The sound is a bit generic and I wish the background engine sounds were more closely tied to the car I‚Äôm currently ‚Äúcontrolling‚Äù.  The colored circles that represent the cars could be replaced with something that actually looks like a car, but I can understand that the position number that each car is in might not show up well that way. Lastly, I think the final tier has too many races... the 16 race season feels a little too long.

Pros: You‚Äôll get out of this game everything you put into it and more. I don‚Äôt remember what I paid for it when I downloaded it, $5.99 I think, but was a bargain considering how much I play this game. I have it installed on my iPhone 6 and my iPad mini 2, and play it on both devices. I really like that long term thinking, careful financial planning, and considered driver development are all rewarded equally. There are a lot of different elements to this game and they all deliver. I wish there were a lot more games of this caliber available on the App Store!

title.label: I don't like sports but this is great

content.label:
I don't do sports, i don't like sports, i don't watch sports. I dunno why i'm being hooked by this game.
I experience a minor bug once, reload the game and it's a blank with only background images.. but i can manage to fix it.
Overall this game is good, and i'm sure it will be even better if you are a fan of racing.
Great Game Guys but please add in the future being able to manage an existing team.

Very intense and addicted, feel fulfilled when u win a game. And after 10+ hours play, I started to use the editor. I wish I could edit more, like progress of HQ, money per race, etc.. 

I am very willing to pay other editors if developer could make it in the future! Thank you!
A little bit of a learning curve but once you get the hang of this game it is hard to put it down. Time flies when playing game so make sure you keep an eye on the clock.

title.label: I'm in love with this game!

content.label: I'm so loving this game. Of course there are a few things I would like to see added and or changes but overall it's fun and challenging. In the end it's up to you how to play huge is the strategy so you can mix your strategies around and you won't run out of ways to play. I hope with time the game develops and doesn't come to an end anytime soon. I'm happy that does not require you to a Wi-Fi. One option would be to play online with another game manager. Thanks guys!!!
